snippet: A minivan found in Brooklyn fit the description of the one used in the kidnapping and murder of Menachem Stark, a developer.
abstract: Investigators locate minivan they believe may have been used to abduct Brooklyn real estate developer Menachem Stark from outside his Williamsburg office; his body was found smoldering in trash container at gas station in Great Neck, Long Island; autopsy found he had died from asphyxiation, indicating he had probably been suffocated.
lead_paragraph: A minivan found in Brooklyn fit the description of the one used in the kidnapping and murder of Menachem Stark, a developer.

headline.main: Van Is Found; Ties to Killing Are Sought
headline.print_headline: Van Is Found; Ties to Killing Are Sought
